name: lexiflow-ai
description: LexiFlow AI - Full-stack legal case management suite

scripts.dev: concurrently -n server,client -c blue,green "npm run dev:server" "npm run dev:client"
scripts.dev:client: wait-on tcp:3001 && cd client && npm run dev
scripts.start: concurrently -n server,client -c blue,green "npm run start:server" "npm run start:client"
scripts.build: npm run build:server && npm run build:client
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd server && npm install && cd ../client && npm install
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules server/node_modules client/node_modules server/dist client/dist
scripts.lint: npm run lint:server && npm run lint:client
